column1: Uchi////Uchi has long since made a name for itself in Houston as one of the most Â (if not the most) well known resturants for high-end Japanese cuisine. Coming with a party of 10 people during my first visit
column2: I was able to sample a large variety of the dishes and small plates
column3: in addition to some of the nigiri
column5: and desserts. Though I can attest that Uchi provides food and service distinctly better than the average Japanese place in Houston
column6: I do think there are other Japanese resturants where your money would be better spent.
